titleStmt.title: The Lord Gen. Cromwel's letter: with a narrative of the proceedings of the English Army in Scotland, and a declaration of the General Assembly, touching the dis-owning their King and his interest. Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.
Church of Scotland. General Assembly.
England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Husband and John Field, Printers to the Parliament of England,
